name: Tales from the Grave in Space

cards.rules_text: When Forrest Jay, Collector enters the battlefield, search your library for up to one Alien card, up to one Robot card, and up to one Zombie card, exile them, then shuffle. You may put one of those cards onto the battlefield if its mana value is less than the amount of mana spent to cast Forrest Jay. Put the rest into your hand.

At the beginning of your first main phase, choose democracy or progress.
• Democracy — Until your next turn, noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
• Progress — Until your next turn, creature spells cost {W} [i](or {1})[/i] less to cast.

Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control or an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put an unethical counter on The Monsterizer.
{T}: Target creature you control has base power and toughness X/X until end of turn, where X is the number of unethical counters on The Monsterizer. Activate only as a sorcery.

Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, The Mechanical Cannibal gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that spell’s mana value. If it’s a permanent spell, you may have The Mechanical Cannibal become a copy of it until end of turn, except it’s still an artifact creature in addition to its other types.

Ward—Sacrifice two creatures
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield or dies, put a +1/+1 counter on The 50-Foot Womanizer. Then if its power is 50 or more, each opponent loses the game.

cards.card_name: The Ape from Beneath the Sea
cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a spell, if its mana value is prime, draw a card. [i](2, 3{,}{ }5{,}{ }7{,}{ }11{,}{ }13, 17, 19, 23, and 29 are prime numbers.)[/i]
Each other creature you control with a prime mana value enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

Vigilance
Other nonartifact creatures get -1/-1.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.

{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{X}{UB}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard with mana value X: Create a token that’s a copy of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery.

Lifelink, haste
Whenever a nontoken artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Flying
[i]The Death’s Head[/i]’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.
Crew 2

[i]({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)[/i]
Barren Encampment enters the battlefield tapped.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Barren Encampment: Add {W}{B}. Draw a card.

[i]({T}: Add {B} or {G})[/i]
Gravity Well enters the battlefield tapped.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gravity Well: Add {B}{G}. Draw a card.

[i]({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)[/i]
Gleaming Metropolis enters the battlefield tapped.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gleaming Metropolis: Add {U}{R}. Draw a card.

[i]({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)[/i]
Roiling Sands enters the battlefield tapped.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Roiling Sands: Add {R}{W}. Draw a card.

Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped, if it isn’t being declared as an attacker, put a doomsday counter on Doomsday Device. Then if there are seven or more doomsday counters on it, sacrifice it. When you do, each player shuffles, then exiles all but the bottom seven cards of their library.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, look at the top card of your library. If it’s a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

Genomic Goons enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Genomic Goons or another creature you control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

Flying, trample
At the beginning of each player’s second main phase, that player chooses a creature they control. Destroy all other creatures that attacked this turn.

Flying
Artifacts you control have “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature named Acular, Digital Nosferatu. Activate only as a sorcery.”

Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +X/+X and gain trample until end of turn, where X is the number of artifact cards in your graveyard.
• Nothing but Laser Wars deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of artifact cards in your graveyard.

At the beginning of the end step, if you control no artifacts, sacrifice Glimmervoid.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{W}, {T}, Tap an untapped artifact you control: Tap target creature.

Vigilance
When Titanium Tracker enters the battlefield or dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Create a 2/2 red and white Ape creature token.

When Gleaming Emissary enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Warpjump. [i](You may reveal and cast an Interstellar card you own from outside the game.)[/i]
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target Robot you control.

Refine [i](When this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact.)[/i]
When Starwalk Opportunist refines an artifact, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under you control or is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

Geodesic Haven enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Geodesic Haven: Add one mana of any color.

Vigilance
Schematic Prodigy gets +2/+0 as long as you control a Robot.

Flying
When Assault Hellephant enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

Flying
Refine [i](When this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact.)[/i]
When Gung-Ho Gunship refines an artifact, put a flying counter on target creature you control.
Cosmic Sabotage deals 4 damage to target tapped creature.
When Colossus Capsule enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Colossus Capsule leaves the battlefield.
Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+2, gains flying, and becomes a Robot artifact creature in addition to its other types.

Choose one —
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

Return all nonland permanent cards with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Orbit 3 [i](Exile this spell with three orbit counters on it when it resolves. Remove one when a land enters under your control. Cast it without paying its costs when the last is removed.)[/i]

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Exile two artifact cards from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Villain creature token. Activate only if there are five or more artifact cards in your graveyard.

cards.rules_text:
First strike
Refine [i](When this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact.)[/i]
When The Robot on the Box Art refines an artifact, each player chooses any number of creatures they control with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures they control.
Whenever Terrore Nello Spazio becomes blocked by a creature, it deals 1 damage to that creature and you gain 1 life.

Choose one or both —
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all nonartifact creatures.
Exile any number of target creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.
